mapper.select: select AMOUNT from SHOPPING_CART_ITEM where USER_ID = #{userId} and CELLPHONE_ID = #{cellphoneId}
mapper.insert: insert into SHOPPING_CART_ITEM (USER_ID, CELLPHONE_ID, AMOUNT) values (#{userId}, #{cellphoneId}, #{amount})
mapper.select: select i.USER_ID, i.AMOUNT, c.ID CELLPHONE_ID, c.BRAND CELLPHONE_BRAND, c.MODEL CELLPHONE_MODEL, c.COLOR CELLPHONE_COLOR, c.PRICE CELLPHONE_PRICE from SHOPPING_CART_ITEM i inner join CELLPHONE c on i.CELLPHONE_ID = c.ID where i.USER_ID = #{userId} order by c.ID
mapper.delete: delete from SHOPPING_CART_ITEM where USER_ID = #{userId} and CELLPHONE_ID = #{cellphoneId}
